transmissions
Interface Transmitter

All Known Implementing Classes:
Protocol, Sensor
public interface Transmitter

A transmitter can send and receive messages.

Author:
Niels Thykier

Field Summary
static int TIMEOUT_IN_STEPS
          The "steps" it takes before a transmission is "timed-out".
 
Method Summary
 void receive(Transmission msg)
          Invoked on the receiving transmitter, when it receives it transmissions.
 void transmit(Transmission msg)
          Invoked when a transmissions is to be transmitted.
 

Field Detail

TIMEOUT_IN_STEPS

static final int TIMEOUT_IN_STEPS
The "steps" it takes before a transmission is "timed-out".

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

transmit

void transmit(Transmission msg)
Invoked when a transmissions is to be transmitted.

Parameters:
msg - the transmissions to send.

receive

void receive(Transmission msg)
Invoked on the receiving transmitter, when it receives it transmissions.

Parameters:
msg - The transmissions.
